actions.text: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 101-592.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to provide for the protection of certain National Park System resources, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Declares that any person who destroys, causes the loss of, or injures any park system resource is liable to the United States for response costs and damages. Declares that amounts recovered for such damage shall be used to manage the National Park System.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the protection of certain National Park System resources, and for other purposes.
